property.description: The path to the demo image file.
property.name: imageFile

property.description: The base address in which to flash the demo image file (for bin file images only).
property.name: imageAddress

property.description: Space delimited list of handlers that can run the demo.
property.name: handlerList

property.description: URI to locate host application used for demo.
property.name: hostAppUri

property.description: Checksum used to verify integrity of downloaded file
property.name: hostAppChecksum

property.description: Arguments used when launching host app for demo.
property.name: hostAppLaunchArgs.win32.x86

property.description: Arguments used for demo when launching host app on linux.
property.name: hostAppLaunchArgs.linux.x86

property.description: Arguments used for demo when launching host app on Mac OS X.
property.name: hostAppLaunchArgs.macosx.x86_64

property.description: Name of directory where host application will be installed
property.name: hostAppInstallDirName

property.description: Name of scenario ID for multi node demos
property.name: scenarioId

property.description: If set, an SDK which contributed the demo. Note that this might not be set since many demos do not come from SDKs.
property.name: contributingSdk

property.description: Whether the best demo handler (executor) should always be the default handler
property.name: bestHandlerAsDefault

property.description: the path to the bootloader for a demo
property.name: bootloaderFile
